Half-Life is a game i consider  to be one of the greatest fps games ever released. Okay, im getting ahead of my self.. You are put in the shoes and glasses of Gordon Freeman, theoretical physicist and an employee at the Black Mesa research facility. You are to take part in a experiment involving hazardous materials of alien origin, but of course everything doesnt go as planned. A dimensional rift is opened betweene Earth and the alien world Xen, allowing strange and dangerous creatures to escape into the facility. Your goal is set. Reach the surface and try to survive the numerous alien beings and special forces soldiers sent to cover up the incident.
Half-Life holds up in both gameplay and storytelling.
You will have to maneuver Gordon through the hazardous corridors of Black Mesa, absorbing the enviroment and batteling increasingly more dangerous enemies with some of the most responsive movement and shooting controlls of the time.
As you explore the research facilities, you are free to absorbe as much of the story as you want. What is Xen? Who is the G-Man? How does Gordon manage to carry so many weapons while running at the speed of an olympic athlete? These are questions that might never get answered. If you havent yet played Half-Life then you owe yourself to experience this pc classic atleast once. 
Grab that crowbar and prepare to get your HEV suit messy.

Very few games can be called revolutionary but Half-Life is the one that deserves it the most. I've seen alot of people claiming that this game is way too overrated due to nostalgia and blind fanboyism, perhaps that has some truth in it, Half-Life was my first ever PC game and I still remember the day I first played it back in 1999 but then again I played a lot of FPS games since and none really left such a deep impact as this masterpiece. Has it stood the test of time now in 2018? I'll let you be the judge of that but keep in mind just how influential this piece of software was back in 98, games are not only pretty graphics, games are the sum of the entire experience you end up with after the end credits roll!

Плюсы:
1) Интересный сюжет.
2) Множество загадок.
3) Красивая графика и мимика лиц для своего времени.

5) На игру было сделано много продолжений,модов и тд,например (Counter-Strike,Half-Life Blue Shift и тд).

[spoiler]I'm terrible at writing reviews, but here goes.[/spoiler]

[h1]The game that started it all[/h1]

[h1][Story and Design] -SPOILERS AHEAD-[/h1]
It gave us a world and a story we have never seen before, you're Gordon Freeman, scientist at the Black Mesa Research Facility. Your experiment goes terribly wrong, ripping a hole through earth and the alien world Xen. Then you're introduced to all these unique aliens and environments, fighting for your survival. Later on it becomes a fight with aliens and humans, who plan to wipe out all Black Mesa personnel. [spoiler]Your objective changes, when you're tasked to travel to Xen, and defeat the alien baby monster ruler, Nihilanth.[/spoiler][spoiler]Then you're introduced to the mysterious G-Man, in my opinion the most unique character in a game of all time. He gives you a choice, to work for him, or to be put in a battle you have no chance of winning.[/spoiler]

[h1][Gameplay][/h1]

[Aliens]
The first aliens you see, don't really give off a challenge especially when you pick up a pistol. It's a sense of warmup for the upcoming hostiles ahead, such as the bulky Alien Grunt, and the fast flying Controller.

[HECU]
You're introduced to the HECU, the people who were supposedly going to save you, but instead plans to wipe out every single person involved with the Black Mesa incident. They have a ridiculously large healthpool and usually charge at you, with their high amount of damage. It gives you a challenge along the way of survival.

[Movement]
To be honest, I felt like the movement speed was kind of speedy, and I had myself falling off ledges often, so I just had to change the friction amount using the console, but honestly it's not really much of a big problem.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[h1]Overall, Half-Life is just a highly memorable experience, and I would recommend it to everyone who hasn't played it yet. The amazing design and storytelling just evolved the gaming industry as a whole, while balancing the challenging but worthwhile gameplay too.[/h1]
A Timeless Masterpiece!

Definitve one of the great classics of video game history. Indeed a great and extraordinary game for its time and audience. But if you are reading this review, you are not a nostalgic who wants to play the game of his teenager years again but someone who is new to Half-Life. And I have to tell you: Don't buy it.

It doesn't compare at all to modern shooter, Sci-Fi-Games or riddle-based games. The controls are awful, the difficulty is too high to enjoy the game smoothly as a casual gamer (EDIT: I totally forgot you can choose it in the beginning - I do not remember what I chose but you will have good run with one lower than what you take in "modern" games I think)  and I don't think we need to discuss the graphics of a game from 1998. 

The story is nice for a shooter but very railroaded and you can get lost easily because nearly nobody is talking to you for hours throughout the game.

My recommendation: If you want to relive the feeling of the changing millenium in a video game, give it a shot while it's on sale. But if you expect a good shooter to modern measures, you will be heavily disappointed.

1. Передовая игра для 1998, когда на консолях все играли в соник адвернтур, на пк была богоподобная халва.
2. Лучшая игра для спидрана, т.к. нет рандома, очень важен четкий мувмент, да и куча разных, интересных, красивых трюков что неплохо так сокращают игру, что не скажешь про однотипный спидран хл2.
3. Лучший мультиплеер, самая активная и скилозависимая игра, гемплей оочень сильно зависит от карты на которой ты играешь, на некоторых это вообще чуть ли не разные игры .
4. Комьюнити
5. Что ты отзывы читаешь, иди покупай да проходи, иди в аг играй...

Yes, this game came out in 1998. I wasnt even breathing then, but about six months ago I bought this game because it was 99 cents on a sale. I didnt think much of it at first, but then I started playing it.... THIS GAME IS AMAZING! YES, THE GRAPHICS ARE NOT THE BEST BUT YOU CANT BEAT THE HOURS OF FUN GAMEPLAY AND IMMERSIVE STORY! I WENT ON AND PLAYED ALL OTHER GAMES SET IN THE HALF LIFE UNIVERSE (Portal, Portal 2, Half Life 2 etc.) EVER SINCE IVE PLAYED THESE GAMES IT HAS CHANGED MY PRESPECTIVE ON ALL OF GAMING! THESE GAMES ARE MASTERPIECES! WHAT ARE YOU WAITING FOR? STOP LOOKING AT THIS REVIEW AND PUT THIS THING IN YOUR LIBRARY ASAP!!!!!!!
